remark.ch: 資訊電機學院大學部四年級可選修。

goal.en: 1. Guide students to analyze and design antennas and microwave circuits using electromagnetic simulaiton software 2. Guide studuents to understand the physical insights behind the operation of electromagnetic simulaiton software 3. Guide students to build up the basic concepts of numerical electromagnetics
goal.ch: 1. 引導學生利用電磁模擬軟體分析設計天線、微波電路 2. 引導學生瞭解電磁模擬軟體操作背後的物理概念 3. 引導學生建立數值電磁的基礎概念

content.en:
1. Introduction to modern computer aided engineering
2. Review of electromagnetic theory, microwave circuit, and antenna
3. Basic numerical electromagnetics
4. Case study: antenna
5. Case study: antenna array
6. Case study: microwave passsive circuit (I)
7. Case study: microwave passsive circuit (II)
8. Case study: microwave active circuit (I)
9. Case study: microwave active circuit (II)
10. Computer-aided design optimization and automation
content.ch:
1. 基礎電磁學複習
2. 數值電磁學簡介
3. 天線設計案例介紹
4. 微波被動電路設計案例介紹
5. 微波主動電路設計案例介紹
6. 微波電路設計自動化

grading.en: Homework (30%) Midterm group report (30%) Final project (40%)
grading.ch: 作業 (30%) 期中分組報告 (30%) 期末分組報告 (40%)

en.Assessments: Assignments ， Presentation/Oral Exam ， Research Report(printed on paper) ， Practices/Experiments
